text: Lo que le Pasó a Santiago (; English: "What Happened to Santiago") is a 1989 Puerto Rican drama movie directed by Jacobo Morales (who also stars) and also starring Tommy Muñiz, Gladys Rodríguez, René Monclova, Johanna Rosaly, Roberto Vigoreaux. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1990. ==Other websites== * *Entire film (English subtitles) on Odnoklassniki Category:1989 drama movies Category:Puerto Rican movies Category:Movies directed by Jacobo Morales Category:Movies set in Puerto Rico Category:Movies about old age
title: What Happened to Santiago
